content.en: Hyperspectral algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different challenges in the field of hyperspectral endmember extraction. These algorithms aim to improve the accuracy, computational efficiency, handling of noise and outliers, integration of spatial and spectral information, and estimation of the number and spectral signatures of endmembers. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists are able to extract endmembers more effectively and efficiently, leading to advancements in hyperspectral imaging and analysis.
content.da: Hyperspektrale algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer inden for hyperspektral endmemberekstraktion. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden, den beregningsmæssige effektivitet, håndteringen af støj og outliers, integrationen af rumlig og spektral information samt estimeringen af antallet og de spektrale signaturer af endmembers. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer er forskere i stand til at udtrække endmembers mere effektivt og effektivt, hvilket fører til fremskridt inden for hyperspektral billeddannelse og analyse.
